content: * F.N.B. Corporation receives final regulatory approvals for First National Bank of Pennsylvania and Yadkin Bank merger
name: FNB Corporation
title: BRIEF-F.N.B. receives final regulatory approvals for proposed merger with Yadkin Financial

content: NEW YORK The Federal Reserve has approved F.N.B. Corporation's  acquisition of Yadkin Financial Corp   two people familiar with the matter said on Friday  the first U.S. bank merger to receive regulatory clearance in 2017.
name: FNB Corporation
title: Exclusive: Federal Reserve approves F.N.B.'s acquisition of Yadkin - sources
